text: Coprobacter fastidiosus is a Gram-negative, obligately anaerobic, rod-shaped, non-spore-forming and non-motil bacterium from the genus of Coprobacter which has been isolated from the faeces of an infant in Russia. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Coprobacter fastidiosus at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Bacteroidetes Category:Bacteria described in 2013
title: Coprobacter fastidiosus
